favourite.article: Dear Abner: I am a teacher of English. I like to help you and your family members with the English language. If you are interested please email me to the given address. With God's Blessings Andy

I hope that I'll impruve more my english language and communication bether with ours friends in God in the world, because Jesus Christ is so good for us and living in us corporaty wich divine live in the chirth. That is my pray oll of days!! Am√©m!!
